modShortDescription: This 7 Days to Die mod randomizes the number of mod slots on Weapons, Tools, and Armor (0-5).
modDescription:
This 7 Days to Die mod randomizes the number of mod [slots](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-more-slots/) on [Weapons](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-weapons/), [Tools](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-tools/), and Armor (0-5).

[**Download**](https://yehonal.github.io/DownGit/#/home?url=https://github.com/TSBX-7D/Modlets/tree/master/TSBX_RandomModSlots)

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/8169-tsbx-collection/).

**Credits:** [TSBX](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/tsbx/)
